  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2532</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2532</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Les vêtements</string>
            <string language="en">Clothes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kleidung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vêtements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Roupa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vestiti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενδύματα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>fr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre la roba. Conté tres parts de presentació del lèxic, un exercici pràctic i tres parts d'autoavaluació. Un enllaç permet recordar el lèxic dels colors i les regles en femení i plural adaptats al tema del vestir. També s'hi troba un enllaç amb el diccionari de TV5monde.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on clothes. It includes a three-part vocabulary presentation, a practice exercise, and a three-part self-assessment section. There is a link for checking the names of colours and the rules for forming the feminine and the plural, and another link to the TV5monde dictionary.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió</string>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">entorn d'aprenentatge</string>
            <string language="en">learning environment</string>
            <string language="es">entorno de aprendizaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material didàctic</string>
            <string language="en">teaching materials</string>
            <string language="es">material didáctico</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf Kleidung. Er schließt eine three-part 
Wortschatzdarstellung, eine Übung und ein three-part Selbstbewertung 
Kapitel ein. Es gibt ein Link für die Überprüfung der Namen 
von Farben und der Richtlinien auf Formung das weibliche und der 
Plural und ein anderes Link zum TV5monde Verzeichnis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
des vêtements. Elle inclut une présentation en trois parties 
de vocabulaire, un exercice pratique, et une section en trois parties 
de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment. Il y a un lien pour examiner les noms de
couleurs et les règles pour assurer former le féminin et le pluriel,
et un lien différent au dictionnaire de TV5monde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) na roupa.
Inclui uma apresentação three-part do vocabulário, um 
exercício de prática, e uma seção three-part do self-assessment. 
Há uma ligação para verificar os nomes das cores e as réguas
para ver se há dar forma ao feminine e ao plural, e uma outra 
ligação ao dicionário de TV5monde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sui 
vestiti. Include una presentazione in tre parti di vocabolario, 
un'esercitazione di pratica e una sezione in tre parti di valutazione 
di se stesso. Ci è un collegamento per controllare i nomi dei 
colori e le regole per vedere se c'è formare il femminile ed il 
plurale e un altro collegamento al dizionario di TV5monde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στα 
ενδύματα. Περιλαμβάνει μια τριμερή παρουσίαση λεξιλογίου, 
μια άσκηση πρακτικής, και ένα τριμερές τμήμα αυτοαξιολόγησης. 
Υπάρχει μια σύνδεση για τον έλεγχο των ονομάτων των 
χρωμάτων και των κανόνων για το θηλυκό και τον πληθυντικό, και μια
άλλη σύνδεση με το λεξικό TV5monde.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenumgebung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">environnement d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matériel didactique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ambiente de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ambiente imparante</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαιδευτικά υλικά</string>
          </keyword>
